CustomField.formula: Closing_Statement_Contract_Price__c - ( Closing_Credit_Agent__c + Closing_Credit_Other__c + Closing_Statement_Deposit__c + Option_Fee_at_Closing__c ) + ( Other_Costs_Paid_at_Closing__c + Acq_Costs_Paid_at_Closing__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Closing Statement Contract Price - (Closing Credit Agent + Closing Credit Other + Closing Statement Deposit + Option fee at Closing) + (Other Costs Paid at Closing + ACQ Costs Paid at Closing)
CustomField.label: Closing Statement Funds Due from Buyer
